page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: "I was woken up at 7.45 am. when mum pulled the covers off my bed. I got dressed ready for school, then ate my {breakfast}cereal.When I got to school several children were already in the playground playing games or talking.At 9 am. we went inside.Our school day had begun.We spent the day doing maths, English,P.E.,art, reading and watching t.v. I stayed for a packed lunch of cheese sandwiches, chocolate wafer and fruit pie. At 3.15 pm.,{after school,}I took the dog for a walk and played with my friends on the village green. {Supper}was toad-in-the-hole and new potatoes.I helped clear the table and wash up.My grandparents came on a surprise visit. I went to bed at 9 pm. and read my scout book before going to sleep."
